description:
Do you want to teach English Abroad? Have you ever thought of teaching English as a second language? Are you looking to start your career as an ESL teacher in Thailand but you are feeling overwhelmed with information? Do you want to take a gap year to teach English in Thailand but are scared to take the initial step? Is living in Thailand your ultimate dream but you do not know how to make a living here?

Teaching ESL in Thailand is rewarding and allows for an amazing lifestyle. This course will empower you with everything you need to know about teaching in Thailand.

In this course I will help you:

  • Plan your trip to Thailand.
  • Choose the perfect location within Thailand for you.
  • Give you a realistic view of what teaching in Thailand is all about.
  • Give you an estimate of how much money you need to get you started.
  • Give you the facts on what you need in order to be a teacher in Thailand.
  • Give you the accurate requirements for teaching in Thailand.
  • Give you a clear step by step guide to take in order to guarantee a teaching job in Thailand.
  • Ongoing assistance if you have any more questions.

Sign up today and start your journey to become an English teacher in Thailand.

What others are saying about this course:

"Saved me so much time and money!

Larissa is really honest and practical throughout this course and it was such a good kickstart for me to actually go out and teach in Thailand. She helps you decide whether it's right for you, and avoid all the pitfalls. Gives loads of great shortcuts and makes you realise it really is possible to make money living abroad.

Have got my job all sorted now and can't wait to get started.

Would highly recommend the course."

-Louise Croft

"Straightforward info I needed!

This course had the perfect straightforward info I was looking for on how to become an English teacher in Thailand. I've been wanting to travel for a long time, and I think teaching english is probably the easiest way I could get myself someplace cool and still make money!

The instructor broke it all down in a very easy way, and made it fun to watch the videos. She really seems to understand how to make it all work together! I've seen the info in other places online, but this is by far the most complete information I could find from someone who ACTUALLY taught there."

-Jesse Zagorsky
title: Teach English in Thailand
